history.proof: intros Q a p Hz Hcl. induction p. - destruct Hz. shelve. - simpl. destruct Hcl. + shelve. + shelve.

ctx: intros Q a p Hz Hcl.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros Q a p Hz Hcl.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables a, p, q.

ctx: intros Q a p Hz Hcl.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros Q a p Hz Hcl.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, a0 : Term A n p : list (Term A n) Hz : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a a1 : Term A n p0, q, s : list (Term A n) H : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a1 H0 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q Hcl : CombLinear Q p0 H1 : eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a1 q) p0) IHp : CombLinear Q p -> CombLinear Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p) Unable to unify "CombLinear Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p)" with "CombLinear Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a a0) (mults multA (n:=n) a p))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> CombLinear Q p -> CombLinear Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p)

Premises:

mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mults : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> A) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n)

OrderStructure : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop

intros Q a p Hz Hcl.
induction p.

- simpl. destruct Hcl.

original: intros Q a p Hz Hcl. induction p. - destruct Hz. - simpl. destruct Hcl. + apply CombLinear_1; auto. + apply IHp; auto.
